trans-unit.target: 然而,从我读到的关于Verilog和VHDL的内容来看,这些工具似乎是关于帮助设计的。

trans-unit.source: I've tried writing quick `icemu` prototype in C and Rust, but they were needlessly complicated.
trans-unit.target: 我曾试过用C和Rust写快速的 "icemu "原型,但都是不必要的复杂。

trans-unit.source: ICemu's goal is not that! Its goal is to help you debug the software you're going to flash on your
trans-unit.target: ICemu的目标不是这个! 它的目标是帮助你调试你要在你的电脑上闪现的软件。

trans-unit.target: 如果你的电路中带有单片机,你可以通过**直接模拟电路

trans-unit.target: 我读到的关于Verilog/VHDL仿真器上的仿真是,你向它提供一系列的

trans-unit.source: With Python, it's easy to write the software and add new chips. Because there's gonna be a *lot*
trans-unit.target: 有了Python,编写软件和添加新的芯片就很容易了。因为会有很多*。

trans-unit.source: With emulation, we have a quick setup time, introspection capabilities, all this stuff. We can then
trans-unit.target: 有了仿真,我们就有了快速的设置时间,反省能力,这些东西。然后我们可以

trans-unit.source: You can install `icemu` with pip on python **3.4+**:
trans-unit.target: 你可以在python **3.4+**上用pip安装`icemu`。

trans-unit.source: You could then play with pins at your heart contents and have them "propagate" through wires and IC
trans-unit.target: 你就可以在你的心脏内容处玩弄引脚,让它们通过电线和IC "传播"。

trans-unit.source: sr1 = CD74AC164()
trans-unit.target: sr1=CD74AC164()

trans-unit.source: sr1.pin_CP.wire_to(dec.pin_Y0)
trans-unit.target: sr1.pin_CP.wire_to(dec.pin_Y0)

trans-unit.source: sr1.pin_DS1.wire_to(mcu_pin)
trans-unit.target: sr1.pin_DS1.wire_to(mcu_pin)

trans-unit.source: sr2 = CD74AC164()
trans-unit.target: sr2=CD74AC164()

trans-unit.source: sr2.pin_CP.wire_to(dec.pin_Y1)
trans-unit.target: sr2.pin_CP.wire_to(dec.pin_Y1)

trans-unit.source: sr2.pin_DS1.wire_to(mcu_pin)
trans-unit.target: sr2.pin_DS1.wire_to(mcu_pin)
